name: meditrust-supply-chain

scripts.deploy:polygon: NETWORK=polygon npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon-testnet: NETWORK=polygonAmoy npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygonAmoy
scripts.deploy:base: NETWORK=base npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network base
scripts.deploy:base-testnet: NETWORK=baseSepolia npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network baseSepolia
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: NETWORK=arbitrum npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network arbitrum
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-testnet: NETWORK=arbitrumSepolia npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.setup:complete: npm run compile && npm run deploy:polygon-testnet && npm run deploy:base-testnet && npm run deploy:arbitrum-testnet
